title: Petco Unleashed Chihuahua Race - NY 2008 - Presented By Petc

These little guys sure are fast, but who has the fastest Chihuahua? PETCO is on a quest to search for America's fastest Chihuahua! PETCO Unleashed 4th Annual National Chihuahua Race in New York on 5/03/08.

asset.hookText:
Subscribe to our channel:
http://bit.ly/12dY9oO
 
These little guys sure are fast, but who has the fastest Chihuahua? PETCO is on a quest to search for America's fastest Chihuahua! PETCO Unleashed 4th Annual National Chihuahua Race in New York on 5/03/08.
 
Something extraordinary happens when pets and people connect. A unique bond is formed that results in something powerful, not only between pets and people, but in a way that makes the world a better place. Our promise is to nurture that relationship completely--mind and body.
